item.description:
"Come and play and you may say, the person at 3 is the one for me"...

"The women are fine at hole number 9"...

"When you see the man at 10, you may want to see him again"... "At hole number 8, make plans for a date"...




THE IRA ANNOUNCES A


NEW AND EXCITING SINGLES HAPPY HOUR FOR THURSDAY JULY 9 2009



THIS VENUE PROMISES TO BE SO UNIQUE AND MONSTEROUS ALL WILL HAVE A GLOWING TIME …… DO I HAVE YOUR ATTENTION?????






THE MONSTEREROUS DETAILS:



Date and Time: Thursday July 9, 2009 Time from 6:00-9:00PM. 3 HOURS OF PLAY TIME………..


Where: MONSTER MINI GOLF/ 20 MAIN STREET/DEXTER PLAZA/WINDSOR LOCKS, CT. 06096 ( http://www.monstermin...)


Description: BLACK LIGHTS AND THEATRICAL VISUAL EFFECTS SET THE MONSTER MOOD!!!!!!!!!!!!


3 HOURS OF SINGLE MINLGING AT IT’S VERY BEST


18 HOLES OF MONSTER-THEMED GLOW-IN –THE DARK-MINIATURE GOLF


CHOICE AFTER CHOICE OF ARCHADE GAMES AND AIR HOCKEY. ( Most only .25) to play


ADULT STYLE SINGLE TWISTER- And how much fun will this be..........??????


MUSIC AND MORE MUSIC……WE HAVE OUR OWN DJ PLAYING A WIDE RANGE OF MUSIC


WE HAVE 2 PRIVATE ROOMS---------- FOR OUR OWN BYOB AND BYOF……Bring your on Cocktail of Choice, and Bring a Monstrous FOOD ITEM TO SHARE….( The cocktails can all be consumed in our Private Room)


ALL PLATES/NAPKINS/CUPS/ICE WILL BE PROVIDED


DRESS: IF YOU CAN, DRESS IN WHITE, AS THIS COLOR WILL GLOW BETTER IN THE DARK……


THE IRA WILL OF COURSE PROVIDE NAMES TAGS/ AND WONDERFUL PERSONAL INTRODUCTIONS TO ALL.


LOW LOW COST OF $15.00 FOR THE ENTIRE THREE HOURS. ( SUCH A DEAL)……..




RSVP: MISTRCHRMING@ AOL.COM 860-604-5792


PLEASE RSVP NO LATER THAN JULY 8 2009.


MAXIMUM LIMIT OF THE FIRST 75 SINGLES…….( Please note: This is FOR SINGLES ONLY- SORRY- NO COUPLES)
item.name: THE IRA HAPPY HOUR WITH A NEW AND MONSTEROUS TWIST OF EXCITEMENT
